name: api_core_SerializedObject
description: SerializedObject and SerializedProperty are classes for editing serialized fields on Unity objects in a completely generic way. These classes automatically handle dirtying individual serialized fields so they will be processed by the Undo system and styled correctly for Prefab overrides when drawn in the Inspector.

properties.name: context
properties.description: The context used to store and resolve ExposedReference types. This is set by the SerializedObject constructor.

properties.name: forceChildVisibility
properties.description: Controls the visibility of the child hidden fields.

properties.name: hasModifiedProperties
properties.description: Is true when the SerializedObject has a modified property that has not been applied.

properties.name: isEditingMultipleObjects
properties.description: Does the serialized object represents multiple objects due to multi-object editing? (Read Only)

properties.name: maxArraySizeForMultiEditing
properties.description: Defines the maximum size beyond which arrays cannot be edited when multiple objects are selected.

properties.name: ApplyModifiedPropertiesWithoutUndo
properties.description: Applies property modifications without registering an undo operation.

properties.name: CopyFromSerializedProperty
properties.description: Copies a value from a SerializedProperty to the corresponding serialized property on the serialized object.

properties.name: CopyFromSerializedPropertyIfDifferent
properties.description: Copies a changed value from a SerializedProperty to the corresponding serialized property on the serialized object.

properties.name: SetIsDifferentCacheDirty
properties.description: Update hasMultipleDifferentValues cache on the next /Update()/ call.

properties.name: UpdateIfRequiredOrScript
properties.description: Update serialized object's representation, only if the object has been modified since the last call to Update or if it is a script.
